issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
During KS testing I noticed, that if "Partial Curl" chosen, Modal Window does not change orientation from landscape to portrait mode. There is also no rotation to the portrait mode after "Close" button pressed and "Main" Window appears.

Not a regression, occurs in 2.0.2 as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink in landscape mode
2. Go to Base UI - Modal Windows
3. Scroll down to "Partial Curl" in first column
4. Press "Show modal"
5. Rotate device to portrait
6. Press "Close" button

Expected result:
Modal and "Main" windows should change orientation

Actual result:
Modal and "Main" windows don't change orientation
fields.summary: iOS: Modal window does not change orientation
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206172244
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120618154152
Device: iPhone 4S 5.0.1

comments.body:
Issue  reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 5.1
Closing ticket as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
